entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
